issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
We have created some code in Titanium to download a PDF via a simple HTTP GET request. The PDF is downloaded on Titanium iOS but not Titanium Android ('firewall error'). We have also created native iOS and Android apps and the PDF downloads fine.

Is there a specific issue with Titanium Android that might be causing this problem?

comments.body:
Hi,

Please provide a simple test case to reproduce your problem. That will be really helpful to address your problem. Thanks

Regards,
Shuo
